title: PHPmove_uploaded_file()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPmove_uploaded_file()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Definition and Usage
The move_uploaded_file() function moves an uploaded file to a new destination.
Note:
This function only works on files uploaded via PHP's HTTP POST upload mechanism.
Note:
If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.
Syntax
move_uploaded_file(
file
,
dest
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
file
Required. Specifies the filename of the uploaded file
dest
Required. Specifies the new location for the file
Technical Details
Return Value:
TRUE on success, FALSE on failure
PHP Version:
4.0.3+

★
+1
